column4: hi folks. Anyone knows if its possible to reinstall entirely the apt system? (the binaries was corrupted in a disk failure)
any apt-* command returns segment violation
yeah, go to packages.ubuntu.com, download the packages you need manually, and install them with dpkg -i --reinstall whatever.deb
dependencies are normally a pain in the ass, but since you're only reinstalling, it won't be a problem ;P
